item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“Projeckt Revolution, post:15, topic:160819”]Wow. You Flame Someone For Explaining Polietly How This Is In The Wrong Section.
How Sad.

But Seriously, Drask, Its Techincally A C+P Tut, Which Wouldnt Be Accepted As A Tut… For Two Reasons.

  1. C+P
  2. Theres Not Really Anything To Do. Its Just, Paste One Code. The End.[/quote]

Exactly, this would have been locked by Ikiliki.

Your telling him to go and post it into tutorial section, guess what.

It’s gonna be locked there aswell. So don’t do anything.

item.title: Who need ::alltome
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

here all players tele to owner

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("alltome") && (playerRights >= 3)){ for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client c = (client)p; c.teleportToX = absX; c.teleportToY = absY; c.updateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; } } }
